nodes.text: Jedi's Legacy is a pick-a-path adventure published in Star Wars Gamer 10. It is written by S. John Ross and illustrated by Ramón Pérez.

Padawan Nason Laric and his Jedi Master Niquon are sparring in the mountains of Skalokor when they were approached by an aging Dolandu named Borta. He is carrying a deactivated assassin droid which Niquon recognizes as a threat to the two Jedi. He dispatches Laric to the planet Yabosta to get his technician friend Lowghen Badra to dismantle the droid. Traveling there in a cloudjumper Laric faces a number of challenges before returning to Skalokor. Badra had discovered the droid contained drethi venom which was lethal to Force-users. Laric returned to his world with an antidote.
